duck.Name: Duck
duck.Text: There is in this park a capyracle. He can tell you who killed your sister!

duck.Name: Duck
duck.Text: It's my pleasure to help you!

capyracle.Name: Rick
capyracle.Text: Good evening, sacred capyracle! I want to ask you something...

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: I aleady know what is your question.

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: You want to know who killed your sister.

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: The criminals are your wife, Vanessa, and your sister's husband, Martin!

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: Yes, they want to have all your father's money and leave the country.

capyracle.Name: Rick
capyracle.Text: Thank you so much, sacred Capyracle!
